_meanings:
{@--1@} To warm, make
hot, heat thoroughly, scorch,
burn, sear; {#uttaptanArAcalIlAM#}  
<ls>Śi. 11. 50</ls>; {#uttapati suvarRaM suvarRakAraH#} <ls>Mbh.</ls>
melts; so {#cEtro mEtrasya pARimuttapati#}.
(Used in the <ab>Atm.</ab> when used
intransitively ‘to shine’, or when
it has a limb of the body for its
object; {#uttapamAnaH AtapaH#} <ls>Bk. 8. 15</ls>
scorching heat; <ls>Śi. 20. 40</ls>; {#uttapate#}
{#pARI#} <ls>Mbh.</ls>).

{@--3@} To excite, urge
on, press hard.
